string.name: name
string.value: A Third Gift for the Dragon Master
When you reach Lv. 60, #p9010010# starts talking to you...

#p9010010# congratulates you for reaching Lv. 60 and asks that you come see her so that she can give you another scroll. Just how many scrolls has #p9010010# prepared? In any case, go to town and meet #p9010010#.
You received a scroll from #p9010010#. She says that she will give you an even better scroll if you reach Lv. 80 by #bMay 5#k.

Wow, Evan! You're Lv. 60 already? You really are fast... This is all so that you can get my gifts right? Hehehe, I guess everyone need a little motivation. Come #bfind me in town#k so that I can give you the scroll.
Hmm. Why are you acting like you weren't expecting the scroll? Now, now, I can see through that. I know exactly what you're thinking, so no need to pretend to refuse.
I'm glad you're here Evan. Let's just cut to the chase. Here is the scroll that you so desired!

You probably expected this...but this is not #bthe end#k of the scrolls! I will give you the next scroll if you can reach #bLevel 80 by May 4th#k. The next scroll will be better than the previous ones! See you next time, Evan.
